flawed_nl_solution:
He makes 20*40=$<<20*40=800>>800 per week
He used to make 16*25=$<<16*25=400>>400 per week
So his raise was 800-400=$<<800-400=400>>400 per week
So he makes 400*52=$<<400*52=2080>>2080 per year more

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20800, not 2080. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
